com.geom.database

Class GeomAppConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geom.database.GeomAppConnection

  • public class GeomAppConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class sets the connection to the database. Pay attention to the database driver. Here a SQLite database was used
    Author:
    Dasha

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.sql.Connection getInstance()
      Sets the only connection needed The instantiation is restricted to one object because only one connection to the database is needed.
      private static boolean testDatabase(java.sql.Connection conn)
      Test if the Figure table is present in the database If it not present it will create the whole database.

      • testDatabase

        private static boolean testDatabase(java.sql.Connection conn)
        Test if the Figure table is present in the database If it not present it will create the whole database.
        Parameters:
        conn - A SQL connection to the database
        Returns:
        true

      • getInstance

        public static java.sql.Connection getInstance()
        Sets the only connection needed The instantiation is restricted to one object because only one connection to the database is needed.
